question: 迎え
sourceMnemonic: This is the noun version of the kanji <kanji>welcome</kanji>, so it means a <vocabulary>welcome</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>greeting</vocabulary>, but it's usually used for someone who's coming and <vocabulary>meeting</vocabulary> you!
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You learned this reading already so you should be able to read it!
